room_title: Escape room "Time Travel Trouble" by Armadillo Escape Room Adventures in Houston
review: This was a really great escape room! The puzzles were challenging yet fun. We had a group of 3 kids and 4 adults and ended up being 1 clue away! The room was really well thought out and made sense. If we had gone in with a plan and slowed down a hair we could have escaped. I highly reccomend this room!

room_title: Escape room "Time Travel Trouble" by Armadillo Escape Room Adventures in Houston
review: This was one of the best date nights we have ever had! We did the time travel escape room and it was a blast. We will definitely be back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Time Travel Trouble" by Armadillo Escape Room Adventures in Houston
review: We tried this tonight and it was really fun! We got stuck in 1922, but I think we would have fixed the time machine if we'd had more than 6 people or maybe 4 more minutes. It was fun, engaging, and close to home. Definitely worth trying!

room_title: Escape room "Time Travel Trouble" by Armadillo Escape Room Adventures in Houston
review: Starting with great customer service, Armadillo Escape Room Adventures provides a great escape room experience. Creative room, great narrative and in-depth puzzles - we had a great time! Plus, we escaped Time Travel! Thanks for a memorable and enjoyable hour.
